name: here-doc
description: 可以从函数内部的注释获取大段文本，对于需要拼接字符串的需求来说这是一个不错的解决方案。   ``` var heredoc = require('heredoc'); var str = heredoc(function(){/*   within this comment block,   any text   will     be       treated         as     pre-formatted       multiline text   (kinda like html <pre>)   */}) ```
